article_title: Observe launches VoiceAI agents to automate customer call centers with realistic, humanlike voices that donâ€™t interrupt
summary: Observe.AI has launched VoiceAI agents, an AI-driven solution for customer call centers that aim to automate routine interactions, improve customer experience, and reduce operational costs. The platform offers a range of tools including real-time agent assist, AutoQA for quality monitoring, and agent coaching. These VoiceAI agents are designed to handle diverse customer service inquiries using a combination of in-house AI models and partnerships with major providers. The company's advantage lies in integration with existing enterprise systems and quick deployment times, typically within one week. The system is specialized for contact centers and addresses nuances like knowing when a customer has finished speaking.
